summary: Changes the meshes of Daedric armor to that of Iron armor.
descriptionHtml:
Third Mod! 

I have a confession to make. I never liked the look of the vanilla Skyrim Daedric Armour. Too spiky, too obvious, too in-your-face, not practical in the least... that's my opinion, and you are welcome to disagree with it if you hate the idea of armour that actually looks functional. 
As such, this is a mod that changes the meshes of the daedric armour pieces to that of Iron, which is one of the better looking (if sadly low level) armour sets in the game. Nothing fancy, this is another mod that took about half an hour and a cup of coffee to make. 

Other mods seen in the screenshots: 
Brigandine Armors (Another one of mine, not published yet) 
aMidianBorn Book of Silence - Armors (available on the Nexus and highly recommended) 

Please do not upload this file elsewhere without my permission. Hell, why would you bother? This mod took about ten minutes to make with the creation kit (not including playtesting). 

Credits: 
BorderWise (that guy with too much free time) 
Bethesda, for making the game that caused me to develop a dragon fetish. 

Version 1.0: Changed meshes of Daedric armour to that of Iron armour.
author: BorderWise
